svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - March 25 2023

title: "Week in Ethereum News
March 25, 2023" date: "2023-03-25"
Eth News and Links
Shapella (Shanghai + Capella) upgrade
• Update your nodes ready for mainnet Shapella upgrade on April 12 , ensure to update both your beacon
node & validator client
Update your nodes ready for mainnet Shapella upgrade on April 12 , ensure to update both your beacon
• Consensus layer mainnet releases: Lighthouse v4.0.1-rc.0 (hotfix for v4.0.0) Lodestar expected next
week Nimbus v23.3.2 Prysm expected next week Teku v23.3.1
Consensus layer mainnet releases:
• Lighthouse v4.0.1-rc.0 (hotfix for v4.0.0)
Lighthouse v4.0.1-rc.0 (hotfix for v4.0.0)
• Lodestar expected next week
Lodestar expected next week
• Nimbus v23.3.2
Nimbus v23.3.2
• Prysm expected next week
Prysm expected next week
• Teku v23.3.1
Teku v23.3.1
• Execution layer mainnet releases: Besu v23.1.2 Erigon expected next week Geth v1.11.5 Nethermind
Execution layer mainnet releases:
• Besu v23.1.2
Besu v23.1.2
• Erigon expected next week
Erigon expected next week
• Geth v1.11.5
Geth v1.11.5
• Nethermind
Nethermind
• Consensus specs v1.3.0-rc.5 : sets Capella upgrade epoch
Consensus specs v1.3.0-rc.5 : sets Capella upgrade epoch
• Latest all core devs – consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Ben Edgington & Christine Kim : bug
bounty doubled for Shapella specific issues up to $500k, until April 5 final Shapella mainnet shadow
fork planned once all client releases are out Deneb discussions: add proofs to blobs bundle in Engine
API, KZG library startup times for testing and SSZ scope post-Deneb upgrade naming & using a merged
name (CL star + EL city)
Latest all core devs – consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Ben Edgington & Christine Kim :
• bug bounty doubled for Shapella specific issues up to $500k, until April 5
bug bounty doubled for Shapella specific issues up to $500k, until April 5
• final Shapella mainnet shadow fork planned once all client releases are out
final Shapella mainnet shadow fork planned once all client releases are out
• Deneb discussions: add proofs to blobs bundle in Engine API, KZG library startup times for testing
and SSZ scope
Deneb discussions: add proofs to blobs bundle in Engine API, KZG library startup times for testing and
SSZ scope
• post-Deneb upgrade naming & using a merged name (CL star + EL city)
post-Deneb upgrade naming & using a merged name (CL star + EL city)
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade
• Latest EIP4844 implementers call video . Notes from Terence : split EIP4844 SSZ effort from SSZ
overhaul and fee market discussions but no immediate changes
Latest EIP4844 implementers call video . Notes from Terence : split EIP4844 SSZ effort from SSZ
• KZG Ceremony : 83k+ contributors from first general contribution period (now closed)
KZG Ceremony : 83k+ contributors from first general contribution period (now closed)
Layer 1
• EOF mega spec : merged from v1.1 & v2 discussions
EOF mega spec : merged from v1.1 & v2 discussions
• 692 ETH proposer payment , MEV bot lost $1 million
692 ETH proposer payment , MEV bot lost $1 million
Client releases
• Consensus layer: Lodestar v1.6.0 : client monitoring using remote services, fixes for issues
preventing Rocket Pool & Dappnode integration
• Lodestar v1.6.0 : client monitoring using remote services, fixes for issues preventing Rocket Pool &
Dappnode integration
Research
• RIG Open Problem: monitor supply chain health Inclusion time delay for censored transactions is
median of 11 seconds
RIG Open Problem: monitor supply chain health
• Inclusion time delay for censored transactions is median of 11 seconds
• Origami verifiable delay function : folding Plonk proofs
Origami verifiable delay function : folding Plonk proofs
For Stakers
• Lodestar $20k incentive program to try their client & propose a block
Layer 2
• zkSync Era (zkEVM) mainnet alpha open to all, native account abstraction, publishes state diffs
rather than transaction inputs, initially with a 24 hour execution delay
zkSync Era (zkEVM) mainnet alpha open to all, native account abstraction, publishes state diffs rather
than transaction inputs, initially with a 24 hour execution delay
• Taiko (zkEVM) alpha-2 testnet : uses Sepolia testnet
Taiko (zkEVM) alpha-2 testnet : uses Sepolia testnet
• Immutable zkEVM announced, using Polygon zkEVM, gas to be paid in $IMX
Immutable zkEVM announced, using Polygon zkEVM, gas to be paid in $IMX
• Optimism two step withdrawals in Bedrock upgrade, improves bridge security
Optimism two step withdrawals in Bedrock upgrade, improves bridge security
• ARB token reverse-bridging : layer 2 token can be bridged to mainnet
ARB token reverse-bridging : layer 2 token can be bridged to mainnet
EIPs/Standards
• EIPs: EIP6733 : Revert creation in case of collision
EIPs:
• EIP6733 : Revert creation in case of collision
• ERCs: ERC6732 : Redeemable tokens ERC6734 : L2 token list ERC6735 : L2 aliasing of EVM-based
addresses ERC6774 : Non-sellable tokens
ERCs:
• ERC6732 : Redeemable tokens
ERC6732 : Redeemable tokens
• ERC6734 : L2 token list
ERC6734 : L2 token list
• ERC6735 : L2 aliasing of EVM-based addresses
ERC6735 : L2 aliasing of EVM-based addresses
• ERC6774 : Non-sellable tokens
ERC6774 : Non-sellable tokens
Stuff for developers
• Update NFT metadata on OpenSea using ERC4906 events & ERC1155 uri event
Update NFT metadata on OpenSea using ERC4906 events & ERC1155 uri event
• Re-export interfaces & types so users don’t need to install additional dependencies
Re-export interfaces & types so users don’t need to install additional dependencies
• Reentrancy guard proxy : prevents reentrant external calls & read only reentrancy
Reentrancy guard proxy : prevents reentrant external calls & read only reentrancy
• Intro to gas optimization
Intro to gas optimization
• Foundry x Fe : template to compile & test Fe contracts
Foundry x Fe : template to compile & test Fe contracts
• Slither v0.9.3 : adds detector for high complexity functions
Slither v0.9.3 : adds detector for high complexity functions
• Curta CTF TinySig challenge solution
Curta CTF TinySig challenge solution
• slither-docs-action : GitHub Action to generate documentation for Solidity pull requests
slither-docs-action : GitHub Action to generate documentation for Solidity pull requests
• Symbolic execution tools : comparison of Mythril, Manticore, hevm & EthBMC
Symbolic execution tools : comparison of Mythril, Manticore, hevm & EthBMC
• noble secp256k1 & noble ed25519 v2 : single feature modules in 4KB gzipped
noble secp256k1 & noble ed25519 v2 : single feature modules in 4KB gzipped
• Semaphore v3.4.0 : HeyAuthn library to create & manage identities
Semaphore v3.4.0 : HeyAuthn library to create & manage identities
• Circomspect v0.8.0 (static analyzer for Circom): added five new analysis passes
Circomspect v0.8.0 (static analyzer for Circom): added five new analysis passes
Security
• Cloudflare users: rotate Global API key for all accounts
Cloudflare users: rotate Global API key for all accounts
• Transaction simulation vulnerabilities disclosed using basefee, coinbase & gasprice variables
Transaction simulation vulnerabilities disclosed using basefee, coinbase & gasprice variables
• Tincho’s audit process
Tincho’s audit process
Ecosystem
• At least 636k ETH supply lost/frozen so far : Parity wallet bug, contract bugs, burnt, typos &
trapped in WETH
Enterprise
• Coinbase Wallet as a Service public preview on testnet
Coinbase Wallet as a Service public preview on testnet
• Xapo Bank integrated USDC , send & receive USDC from USD accounts, non-US only
Xapo Bank integrated USDC , send & receive USDC from USD accounts, non-US only
Notable at app layer
• ERC4361 (Sign In with Ethereum) integrated with MetaMask : sign in request display & domain binding
ERC4361 (Sign In with Ethereum) integrated with MetaMask : sign in request display & domain binding
• Maker DAO voted to maintain USDC as primary reserve
Maker DAO voted to maintain USDC as primary reserve
• Uniswap mini portfolio : view tokens, NFTs & LP pools
Uniswap mini portfolio : view tokens, NFTs & LP pools
• SpankPay closing down due to no willing fiat rails
SpankPay closing down due to no willing fiat rails
Job Listings
• L2BEAT 💗 is hiring a Senior Software Engineer & Product Owner. Apply here!
L2BEAT 💗 is hiring a Senior Software Engineer & Product Owner. Apply here!
• Nimbus is hiring a Site Reliability Engineer
Nimbus is hiring a Site Reliability Engineer
Job listings: $600 for four issues (75 character limit), payable in ETH/DAI/USDC to abcoathup.eth on
mainnet or Layer 2. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Regulation/business/tokens
• US SEC: Coinbase received Wells notice for potential violations of securities law but SEC declines
to specify which assets are securities Paradigm: “just come in and register” is a fabrication
SushiSwap & Head Chef served with subpoena Justin Sun charged with unregistered sale of securities and
8 celebrities charged for promotion without disclosing payment
US SEC:
• Coinbase received Wells notice for potential violations of securities law but SEC declines to
specify which assets are securities
Coinbase received Wells notice for potential violations of securities law but SEC declines to specify
which assets are securities
• Paradigm: “just come in and register” is a fabrication
Paradigm: “just come in and register” is a fabrication
• SushiSwap & Head Chef served with subpoena
SushiSwap & Head Chef served with subpoena
• Justin Sun charged with unregistered sale of securities and 8 celebrities charged for promotion
without disclosing payment
Justin Sun charged with unregistered sale of securities and 8 celebrities charged for promotion
• Whitehouse 2023 economic report [PDF]: “crypto assets currently do not offer widespread economic
benefits”
Whitehouse 2023 economic report [PDF]: “crypto assets currently do not offer widespread economic
• Do Kwon arrested in Montenegro
Do Kwon arrested in Montenegro
• IRS proposed NFT guidance [PDF] on treatment of certain NFTs as collectibles, feedback requested
IRS proposed NFT guidance [PDF] on treatment of certain NFTs as collectibles, feedback requested
General/crypto
• Ronin exploiter apparently tried to trick the Euler exploiter into using a vulnerable library
Ronin exploiter apparently tried to trick the Euler exploiter into using a vulnerable library
• aCropalypse : cropped/redacted images from Google Pixel’s screenshot editor can be partially
recovered
aCropalypse : cropped/redacted images from Google Pixel’s screenshot editor can be partially recovered
• Goblin Plonk : lazy recursive proof composition
Goblin Plonk : lazy recursive proof composition
• cqlin : efficient linear operations on KZG commitments with cached quotients
cqlin : efficient linear operations on KZG commitments with cached quotients
• Proactive refresh (every 30 seconds) for BLS threshold signatures
Proactive refresh (every 30 seconds) for BLS threshold signatures
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @abcoathup and
@evan_van_ness to get most of the week’s news in real time.
Permalink for this week’s issue: https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-march-25-2023
